entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PublishAot should enable single file safety analyzer #82503
    8.0.0
  • Fix the natvis to display better visualization for GenTree nodes #82497
  • Mono runtime fails to build for win-arm64 (and thus cross-compilers) #82496
  • Mono runtime fails to build cross-compilers for x86/x64 on arm/arm64 #82495
  • System.Media.SoundPlayer doesn't play specific encoding Lavf58.29.100 #82494
  • Stop using select in the Mono debugger agent #82493
    8.0.0
  • Stop using select in the Mono profiler #82492
    8.0.0
  • CMake caching pain with MSVC update #82490
  • [Analyzer] Suggest more optimal SIMD patterns where applicable #82488
  • [Analyzer] Upgrade from platform specific to cross platform intrinsics #82486
    8.0.0
  • Add possibility to add configuration files from anywhere #82485
  • Identity: Adding user to role gives an Invalid Username error (UserManager.cs). #82483
  • [wasm] Blazor/AOT crashing with preview1 - `Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/aot-runtime.c:2443` #82481
  • NativeAOT doesn't generate IL3000 and IL3001 - access to Assembly.Location property #82475
    8.0.0
  • Unroll SequenceEqual for u8 literals #82474
    Future
  • .NET 7 WebAssembly - Algorithm 'Aes' is not supported on this platform. #82472
    Future
  • builds breaking because `CSharpMarkAssembliesWithNeutralResourcesLanguageAnalyzer` fails with `Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'type')` #82467
  • [Feature Request]: Better ILogger sampling and filtering #82465
    Future
  • Support sites with invalid IDN in SslStream #82464
    8.0.0
  • get some docker images with libmsquic from main that contains OpenSSL 3 -- @wfurt #82463
  • Add source gen support for `unspeakable types` #82457
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Configuration section Value discrepancy #82489
    Future
  • Deduplication of symbols by using dedup/linkonce features #80419
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT MissingMetadataException links to .NET Native troubleshooter that recommends using RD.xml. #82498
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.NET.ILLink.Tasks in .NET 8 does not target .NET 8 #82241
    8.0.0
  • DateTime year is wrong when using Japanese calendar in Windows. #82487
  • JIT: hoisting float var profitability mis-categorizes SIMD types #82351
    8.0.0
  • [Fuzzlyn] Jump into the middle of handler region #81675
    8.0.0
  • ReplaceLineEndings is slower than Replace("\r\n") #82491
  • Possible performance regression when accessing field of static generic type #82484
  • Fallback host rid is broken on non-portable builds #81654
    8.0.0
  • Error NETSDK1045 The current .NET SDK does not support targeting .NET 8.0. Either target .NET 7.0 or lower #82280

PullRequests

Created

  • Use asynchronous lock in Parallel.ForEachAsync with synchronous enumerable #82501
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessarion _version++ from a few places #82500
    area-System.Collections, 8.0.0
  • Return singleton enumerators from IEnumerable.GetEnumerator for empty collections #82499
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Fixed name of frozen string dictionary files #82482
    community-contribution
  • [browser] Fixed the 3rd argument for TypedArray.fill() #82480
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [jiterp] Adjust jiterpreter thresholds to exercise it more on CI #82476
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • EventPipe env var to disable stack collection #82470
    EventPipe, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary `unsafe` modifier from `LibraryImport` methods #82462
    community-contribution
  • update Ubuntu 22 Helix images #82460
  • Call base.DisposeAsync on DerivedFileStreamStrategy #82459
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Replace `SafeLocalAllocHandle` in `System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter` #82456
    community-contribution

Merged

  • Refactor Logging.Console configure options #82254
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [mono][aot] Remove unused skip flag in the dedup #82471
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix unbalanced brackets in clrjit natvis GenTree output #82332
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix loop hoisting float var profitability calculation #82352
  • Fix issues with EH in unexecuted loops #82329
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Share test cases for NativeAOT #82216
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [wasi] Add `WasiAppBuilder` task #82126
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Revert changes in libunwind vendor directory #82473
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Enable dedup on tvOS device + arm64 simulators #82403
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [jiterp] Inline some performance-sensitive operations into traces #82469
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [LoongArch64] redesign the compare and condition-branch. #82426
    community-contribution
  • corehost: derive fallback rid from output rid. #82163
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Remove invalid internal attribute which causes warnings #82398
    test-enhancement, linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix DBI loading problem on Linux #82461
  • Add pool provider template reference #82452
  • Update Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native from 16.9.0-beta1.21055.5 to 16.11.23-beta1.23063.1 #82188
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Format host tracing for deps parsing for easier reading #82333
    area-Host

Updated

  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Testmerging JIT/Directed #81969
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement Test Process Watcher #78742
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Refactor common variables used for the "send runtime tests to helix" steps into a shared template that all of our pipelines that run runtime tests can use. #81926
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Lift remaining cmov restrictions by introducing GT_SELECTCC #82235
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace some use of string.CompareOrdinal with string == #82438
  • Store Parallel.ForEachAsync exceptions from cancellation callbacks #82434
  • Fix SafeHandle debug-only _ctorStackTrace for mono #82376
  • Add support for dumping native stacks with cdb #82189
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasi: add workload packs, templates, and Wasi.Build.Tests #81849
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • WIP: Refactor `Interop.LocalAlloc` #82450
    community-contribution
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.C.ConfigurationManager #82259
    area-System.Configuration, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • [wasi+browser] bundle timezones into .wasm #82250
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • Issue correct Enable/Disable commands for EventSources with EventPipe #81867
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Cache and reuse some allocations during Linq.Expression evaluation. #82443
  • [wasm] Make `WasmMainJSPath` optional #81484
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] Always transform `AND(X, CNS(-1))` to `X` #82276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add new System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations features #82311
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Wasi icu load test #82444
  • [NativeAOT] Add System.Globalization.Native builds for iOS-like platforms #82393
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • provide custom marshaller for USER_INFO_1 #82350
    community-contribution
  • Deduplicate platform lists in BuildIntegration #82395
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add CollectionsMarshal.SetCount(list, count) #82146
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update ILLink wording #82050
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [workload] Upstream net7 manifest json and targets #82267
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2120652 #81871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.DirectoryServices #82453
    breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [wasm] Initial emscripten 3.1.30 support #81215
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [eventpipe] Perform endian aware serialization of structs and arrays above FireETW layer #80493
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Convert all usages of target_link_libraries to use PUBLIC/PRIVATE specifiers #81924
    area-Infrastructure
  • Replace RichNav with Code Index #82088
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Mono] Add initial arm64 hardware intrinsics support for mini JIT #82420
  • let user know working directory will be used as content root path by default #82445
    community-contribution
  • Let GenTreeCopyOrReload handle scenarios when FEATURE_MULTIREG_RET is disabled #82451
  • [mono] Raise soft RLIMIT_NOFILE on Linux #82429
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Enable constant folding in Tier0 #82412
  • [HTTP/3] Attempt at using newer image to allow H/3 Windows stress #82226
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix rva[cns] folding #81854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Append leftovers of FromBase64Transform's input buffer to the transform buffer #82148
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][jit] Refactor SIMD type detection. #82419
  • [release/7.0] System.Console: allow terminfo files to be larger than 4KiB. #82082
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 7.0.5
  • Add NT_SIGINFO NOTE to ELF dumps #82449
  • Use optimistic concurrency when configuring JsonTypeInfo metadata. #82198
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] System.Console: allow terminfo files to be larger than 4KiB. #82433
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Console.Unix: fix escape sequence for setting title on 'screen' TERM. #82432
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 7.0.5
  • Add bundle tests that don't use the SDK #81187
    area-Host
  • [Mono]: Add support for lazy runtime init in native-to-managed wrapper, similar to NativeAOT library build. #82253
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Annotation changes only (part 2) #82388
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add Microsoft.NET.ILLink package #82407
    linkable-framework, 8.0.0
  • Fix passing Mac Catalyst -target flag to .mm builds #82292
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Proposed host runtime delegate for loading an assembly #82138
    area-Host
  • [wasm] Remove the EnumCalendarInfo workaround from the pinvoke table … #82362
  • Fixing a bug that causes us to mistakenly demote a gen2 region to gen0 #82413
  • Refactoring store liveness update #80539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Avoid allocations when adding existing items to the blob heap. #81059
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [JIT] On importing a CEE_INITOBJ for a simd, construct a VecCon(0) #81982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add RID for Ubuntu 23.04 #82284
    area-Meta
  • update msquic #81742
    area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Separate the generation of PerfMap and JitDump files #82142
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix the multicore performance of mapping from an instruction pointer to a MethodDesc #79021
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasi] Don't provision wasmtime on CI #82454
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • For Alpine and Void-Linux: If you use linux-musl-x64 for dotnet publish #2202

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement PInvoke #2201

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-watch needs to be updated to newer analyzers #30786
  • `dotnet --info` should also show workload info #30784
  • dotnet-dump not working with private tmp dir #30772

Closed

  • A member with the "Obsolete" attribute is also subject to a warning if it is referenced by "nameof". #30770

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix GenAPI invocation with IncludeAssemblyAttributes #30779
  • [DO NOT Merge] [release/7.0.1xx] Create workloads enumerator lazily in dotnet-new hos #30773
  • Replace File.Move with copy/delete #30769

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30756
  • [GenAPI] Add DocIdSymbolFilter for doc-id API exclusion. #30740
    Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • [25961] - dotnet watch first key press fix #26870
    area-System.Console
  • fix issue 30369 enable docker build platform switch #30762
  • Issue 25536 enable -disable-build-servers for pack, clean, test, msbuild #30481
    Area-NetSDK
  • Allow multiple loggers for VSTest command #30686
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Investigate https://github.com/dotnet/templating/issues/5921 #30732
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2120107 #30714
    Area-Infrastructure

Issues

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enum preselection in switch expressions breaks `enter` behavior. #67005
  • Incorrect `IDE0042` when tuple variable has usages #66994
  • Library and Tools Subset build times regression (50+% increase) #67003
    17.6

Closed

  • Add Parameter - Consider translating default values between languages #41062
    Backlog
  • Incorrect "IDE0001 Name can be simplified" diagnostic on switch statement returning expression tree, code fix produces invalid code #41006
    Backlog
  • InitializeAsync of AbstractPackage invokes MEF synchronously #40860
    Backlog
  • NRE from SymbolFinder invoked from CodeLens. #40722
    Backlog
  • Driver #66999
  • Move `UseValueTuple` from `SymbolDisplayCompilerInternalOptions` to `SymbolDisplayMiscellaneousOptions` #66757
    17.6
  • [Bug]: Wrong type is used from parent namespace #66995
  • New APIs for "Primary Constructors" #66914
  • DocumentationComment missing newline for member declarations #66972
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33421.428 #66990
  • SDK 7.0.200 creates false positive CS0165, Use of unassigned local variable #66987

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve the spans that 'add parameter check' is supported in #67004
  • Fix simplification in nameof expressions #67002
  • Remove CheckServerState #66998
  • Fix 'tuple can be deconstructed' issue with top level statements #66997
  • Properly use 'ValueTuple' instead of native tuples in cref syntax. #66996
  • Avoid deep recursion while emitting deeply nested logical conditions #66993
    Area-Compilers
  • Check count before reusing batched items in `BatchNode` #66992
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators

Merged

  • Add some tests for implement implicitly/explicitly #66985
    Next
  • Move to the regular queue instead of the scouting queue #67001
    Next
  • Port to 17.5: Allow missing CommandLineArgsForDesignTimeEvaluation msbuild property (#66367) #67000
    OnDeckForServicing
  • Create a README for CLaSP #66083
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add more using-alias-to-type tests #66889
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix flag value in option fallback reader #66967
    Next
  • Add 'ExpandValueTuple' as a misc symbol display flag #66929
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Provide access to F# integration tests #66926
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #66989
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Fix signature help parameter selection #66988
  • Results of running 'make member readonly' on IDE #66957
  • Add feature to suggest make struct members `readonly` #66954
  • Clean up test partition warnings #66986
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Rename options to editorconfig like name #66899
    Area-IDE
  • Fix completions in range expressions #66959
    Community
  • Fix SymbolDisplay to use 'Operator' kind when producing the display for an operator symbol #66880
    Area-Compilers
  • Use per-user temporary directories for AnalyzerAssemblyLoader #66983
    Community
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE
  • Use next sibling in SyntaxNode.GetChildPosition() if available #66876
    Area-Compilers
  • Local state tracing instrumentation #66768
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter source generator diagnostics by `SuppressMessageAttribute` #66965
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Clean and rename FeatureOnOffOptions #66881
    Area-IDE
  • Preserve empty NodeStateTable entries #66963
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Add nullability info field into discard expression #66309
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.6
  • Use extension keyword with modifiers #66919
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Client result method accepting arguments that is unhandled by the client results in hanging until timeout #46825
  • Expose the SslStream and Cipher Suite on ITlsHandshakeFeature #46823
  • Blazor WebAssembly loading indicator shows more than 100% in .NET 8 Preview 1 #46822
  • Local build for v6.0.14 on Linux (WSL) is failing on Yarn #46821
  • Examine the performance of AdditionalAssemblies in Router #46820
  • Configure or disable timeouts on long running requests #46818
    8.0-preview4
  • Azure AppService terminating Asp net core web app (.net 5) process #46817
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudAddProduct #46816
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #46815
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, plaintext, plaintext #46814
  • Calling Asynchronous .NET JS Interop Method Synchronously from JS Produces Misleading Error Message #46811
  • E2E tests `WebDriverExtensions.Navigate` argument `noReload` has no effect #46810
  • Debugging & Hot Reload is Broken When App's Base Path is Changed #46809
  • Add WebViewManager.Dispatch() method #46808
    8.0-preview2
  • [Blazor Server] OnConnectionUp and Down every three minutes #46807
  • Identity: Adding user to role gives an Invalid Username error (UserManager.cs). #46806
  • Automatic setting of required attribute on primitive types #46805
  • bind:after does not compile on SDK 7.0.200 #46803
  • `IEmailSender` doesn't appear to be HTML message in gmail body. #46802
  • It will need about 18 mins to stop connection(disconnecting to disconnected) when it lost network(Like disble WiFi insterface). And it wil cause Linux Segmentation Fault when I try to call hub_connection::stop() while connection state is disconnecting. #46801
  • Append version tag helper does not work for scoped CSS and blazor.webassembly.js #46798
  • CS0234: The type or namespace name '...' does not exist in the namespace when using CascadingTypeAttribute #46797
  • Not all values of `Url.Page(values)` show up in the Get method of the page model #46796
  • Blazor insertion into List issue with method OnInitialized #46795
  • blazor client side canot inject httpservice to LoggerProvider #46794
  • [API Proposal] Productize QuickGrid #46789
  • Remove special case handling for numeric type parameter binding in RDF? #46788

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #46792
  • Cookie configuration mystery using `AddCookie` and `ConfigureApplicationCookie` #45788
    Discussions
  • Layout for Component #46771
  • Kestrel config behaves differently when set using env vars vs. in-code #45801
    8.0-preview2
  • Can Not Start Debugging #46799
  • Enhance Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.MultipartBundle package to define a custom bundle format #36978
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Expose the SslStream and Cipher Suite on ITlsHandshakeFeature #46824
    area-runtime
  • Tidy up some irregularities in certificate reloading #46819
    area-runtime
  • Allow Regex engine to be trimmed #46813
    area-runtime
  • Disable Selenium headless mode #46812
  • Brunolins16/minimal/sourcegen/46297 #46791
    area-runtime
  • Update Selenium versions #46790
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Introduce 'RenderTreeBuilder.AddComponentParameter()' #46562
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview2
  • Dispose of old cancellationTokenSource instances during revalidation … #46736
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview2
  • Defer search for dev cert until build bind time #46296
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview2
  • Refactor RoutePatternFactory to trim regex dependency where possible #46793
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview2

Updated

  • TryParse support for request delegate source generator #46696
    area-runtime
  • Fallback using the `CultureInfo.Parent` instead of using hyphen #46637
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Eliminate framework use of 'IJSUnmarshalledRuntime' #46693
    area-blazor
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate
  • Expand FromX support and add route vs. query param inference #46715
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add short circuit in routing #46713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Sections support #46727
    area-blazor
  • Add WebViewManager.Dispatch() method #46644
    area-blazor
  • Productize QuickGrid #46573
    area-blazor
  • Backport SignalR test changes #46648
    area-signalr, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix known type messages in querystring values #46752
    Servicing-consider, area-grpc, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] gRPC JSON transcoding: Fix not supporting JSON name in querystring names #46750
    Servicing-consider, area-grpc, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Bump template tests timeout #46783
    area-mvc, tell-mode, test-fixed, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-22
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Enable per provider filtering #3639

Updated

  • Add AssemblyLoadContext for loading extensions #3649

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Setting SearchBar CancelButtonColor doesn't work on Windows #13507
  • Custom gestures on image in carousel not responding/working #13504
    Backlog
  • Impossible to leave the picker with a physical keyboard #13503
    Backlog
  • Can't get started #13500
  • Wrong height for Label placed inside a Scrollview #13498
  • [WinUI] Flyout Popover doesn't reset "IsPresented" when dismissed via click on contents. #13496
    Backlog

Closed

  • MauiApp.Dispose fails when an IAsyncDisposable service is registered #13422
    8.0-preview2
  • IOS Simulator doesn't load after closing one time (just dotted circle loader) #13502
  • App crashes only in release and only on physical device #8928
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ObjCRuntime.RuntimeException has been thrown #13478

PullRequests

Created

  • Tag Dave Britch for breaking changes #13506
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fixed SwipeItems size dynamically changing the Content Margin #13501
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [iOS] Scroll with the keyboard to not block entries and editors #13499
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview, keyboard
  • Remove "IsPresented/ShouldShowSplitMode" check #13497
    area/FlyoutPage

Merged

  • Implement IAsyncDisposable on MauiApp #13424
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.4.1 to 17.5.0 #13480
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Simplification of user interface declaration in code #12728
    proposal/open, community ✨
  • Include border size in Frame's measurement #13419
    area/layout 🔲
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `Application.OpenWindow()` #13400
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #13266
  • Expose BlazorWebView.TryDispatchAsync() API for access to scoped services #13425
    area/blazor 🕸️, do-not-merge
  • Shell routing and Service registration automation #13402
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #13434
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Handle renamed or deleted MauiImage files #13251
    area/single project ☝️
  • [iOS] Don't scroll more than the available scrollable space #13415
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎, layout-scrollview
  • [Android & iOS] Use the correct colors by themes with Alerts on Android and iOS #13318
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/theme
  • Use the TextColor value to set the ClearButton color on the Entry #13475
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • SensorSpeed: unify sensor intervals across all platforms #13372
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [net7.0] Windows apps do not need GUIDs (remove check) #13034
    area/single project ☝️, do-not-merge, backport/suggested

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • MissingMethodException: Method not found: 'Void CoreTypeMappingParameters..ctor(System.Type, Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Storage.ValueConversion.ValueConverter, Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking.ValueComparer, Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking.ValueComparer, System.Func`3<Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IProperty,Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.IEntityType,Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ValueGeneration.ValueGenerator>)'. #30313
  • Warn on using HashSet with mutated hash code, or similar broken collections #30312
  • Serialization settings with Cosmos Db Provider #30300
  • Update-Database command uses incorrect path #30298
  • efcore not support Maui 'Add-Migration' ? #30268
  • Unexpected `RenameIndex` added to EF Core migration after upgrading from EF Core 3.1 to EF Core 6 #30231
  • Unable to Add code first migration #30229
  • Exception in EF Core SQLite (7.0.2) with Net Topology Suite (7.0.2) #30175
  • How to store a conditional/calculated property in ef core 6 #30127

Updated

  • EF Core Global Query Filter for SaveChanges (Update, Delete) #24122
    Backlog
  • EF7 generating incorrect SQL for the Concat/Union All, The same code was working fine for EF6.4.4 #30273
    Backlog
  • Add calculated properties unmapped to database #30319
  • Merge hierarchyid tests into existing suites #30301
    Backlog
  • Distributed transactions failures when running EF Core tests on main #29054
    Backlog
  • Allow to specify constraint name for default values #11502
    Backlog
  • Howto use Entity splitting to map some properties to main SQLite database and other properties to attached SQLite database #30279
  • DbCommand failure message doesn't include exception details #24530
    Backlog
  • model.GetEntityTypes() is empty inside overridden Generate method with DropTableOperation of custom SqlServerMigrationsSqlGenerator #30318
  • Json column has different support for Chinese in addition and editing #30315
  • Left join on included entities are duplicated if accessing getter property #30317
